subject: Welcome to {{project_title}}!
body:
Dear {{first_name}},

Congratulations! Your email has been successfully verified, and your account with {{project_title}} is now active.

We're excited to have you on board and canâ€™t wait for you to explore all that {{project_title}} has to offer.

If you have any questions or need help along the way, our support team is just a click away. Feel free to reach us at {{support_email}}.

With regards,
The {{project_title}} Team.
